description:
Review

JavaScript is unlike HTML, which can just be used to show content, it is one of the very popular and powerful language on the web. JavaScript enables web designers to add interactivity and functionality to their sites. JavaScript is the programming language of HTML and the Web. It is highly dynamic and lightweight programming language with ample of in built functions.

What you are going to learn

We'll look at writing JavaScript then, how to integrate it with HTML tags and then eventually in a file different from the HTML doc. We'll discuss some of the reasons for using each approach.

We will go through with set up process and then we'll also cover the Boolean type, which is a representation interior of a programming language of True and Untrue, along with some String functions.
title: Learn Essential JavaScript variables and Primitive Types
